Comment: Abilities: A08J (Chain Mana Burn), Researchubertip (Tooltip - Learn - Extended)
Value: Sends a stream of negative magic that reduces the mana of enemies. Requires units to have positive buffs. |n|n|cffffcc00Level 1|r - Destroys 200 mana and bounces 10 times. |n|cffffcc00Level 2|r - Destroys 300 mana and bounces 10 times. |n|cffffcc00Level 3|r - Destroys 400 mana and bounces 10 times.
